thread.title: Ground News - Pictures as hardy swimmers brave icy North Sea to take New Year's Day dip
thread.title_full: Ground News - Pictures as hardy swimmers brave icy North Sea to take New Year's Day dip

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Pictures as hardy swimmers brave icy North Sea to take New Year's Day dip
text:
Summary by Ground News Hardy swimmers braved the icy waters of the North Sea to take a New Year 's dip into 2024 this morning. Dippers were seen jumping into the sea at swimming spots across the region including Saltburn and Whitley Bay. The quick dip has become a tradition for many on Boxing Day and January 1. Some donned fancy dress for the charity dip in aid of animal rescue charity SARA. Share menu More
